scripts.build-pkgs: yarn workspaces foreach -Wt --exclude frontend --exclude @remkoj/optimizely-frontend run build
scripts.rebuild-pkgs: yarn workspaces foreach -Wt --exclude frontend --exclude @remkoj/optimizely-frontend run rebuild
scripts.watch-pkgs: yarn workspaces foreach -Apt --exclude frontend --exclude @remkoj/optimizely-frontend run watch
scripts.update-deps: yarn upgrade-interactive && yarn dedupe && yarn sdks vscode
scripts.update-yarn: yarn set version stable && yarn install && yarn sdks vscode
